name: Demos Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
entries: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The magen makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
